headline: The History of Pintxos in Basque Gastronomy
text: In this timeline, we’ll walk you through the history of pintxos in Basque Gastronomy.

headline: Origin of Pintxos
text: Pintxos originated as simple snacks on a skewer (“pintxo” means spike in Basque), served in bars alongside drinks.

headline: Pintxos Become Bar Staples
text: Bars in the Basque Country popularized pintxos as social snacks, encouraging bar-hopping and variety.

headline: Expansion of Varieties
text: Use of fish, cheese, and vegetables in pintxos increased, enriching the local culinary tradition.

headline: Pintxos in Basque Culture
text: Pintxos become a cultural symbol of Basque identity and community gatherings.

headline: Rise of Gastronomy Movement
text: Influenced by Basque chefs, pintxos begin to be seen as gourmet snacks, not just bar food.

headline: Pintxos Tourism Develops
text: San Sebastián becomes internationally famous for pintxos tours and culinary experiences.

headline: Modern Innovations
text: Use of avant-garde cooking techniques in pintxos; fusion with other culinary styles.

headline: Digital and Social Media Era
text: Pintxos culture promoted globally through blogs, Instagram, and social media, increasing worldwide interest.

headline: Current Era
text: Pintxos remain a vital part of Basque gastronomy and culture, continuously evolving with new creative chefs and global influences.

headline: Erasmus Students Discover
text: Erasmus students engage with Basque culture through pintxos via your social media dissemination plan, promoting cultural exchange and appreciation.
